item.title: Python Basics
item.description: Open file and Display the whole content f = open("file.txt") print(f.read()) Note: by default the opens in "r"(read) mode; Above code is same as below code f = open("file.txt", "r") print(f.read()) Read first 5 bites of a file f = open("file.txt", "r") print(f.read(5)) Read 10 bites After first 100 bytes f = open("file.txt", "r") print(f.tell()) f.seek(100) print(f.tell()) print(f.read(10)) List all files(recursively) for the directory #!/usr/bin/python import subprocess, os p = subprocess.
